review: I am impressed with the video quality over another on line video provider I previously had. I was a bit confused as to where the power button was, and I waited while not using it and it did power itself off as I guessed it would. review: Giving this one star where previously I loved the device and would have given it five. Our home has two and they've worked very well for us and both are connected to our Prime account. I'm giving it this one star review because Amazon has seen fit to add a giant ad at the top of the screen that is visible when you're at the home screen. None of the screenshots on the product page show this newly added ad. If they've added a giant banner ad to the home screen there might be others and they might add more in the future.The ad is a quarter if not more of the screen in height and is nearly the full width of the display. The content of the ad was for a show but to me the content is irrelevant. There are ads now showing up for a product I've paid full price for and I pay for the service to access content. Neither has been discounted to me in exchange for filling my screen with ads.I checked the settings and there is no opt out option for ads even with a connected Prime account.
